title: #193:  Coup d'etat In Slow Motion with Ole Dammegard
description:
Thank you so much for tuning in for another episode of Tin Foil Hat with Sam Tripoli. This episode we are proud to welcome Ole Dammegard to the show to discuss his almost encyclopedia level of knowledge of Operation 40 and the JFK Assassination! Prepare to have your mind blown by what actually went down there.
To find out more about Ole and his work please check out his website...
lightonconspiracies.com
Please support our sponsors....
